name: 楊元森
objective:
寫程式已經成為21世紀工程師維持競爭力的最重要技能。什麼是程式？程式要怎麼寫呢？本課程以循序漸近的方式，從最基本的簡單算術程式開始，漸漸進入與實務問題相關的工程運算，帶領各位同學創造出自己的程式。本課程從最基礎概念開始講授，並配合實機逐步操作，適合完全沒有寫過程式的同學修習。歡迎同學自備筆記型電腦來上課。對於使用桌上型電腦的同學，本課程亦提供操作錄影影片供同學回家仿做。

本課程需要同學習慣於大量使用鍵盤。建議同學在修課之前練習鍵盤使用。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Computers and Programming
Week 2: Typing / Spreadsheet  formula, matrix multiplication and inversion 
Week 3: Spreadsheet formula: min, round, sqrt, if, countif, match, index
Week 4: Variables and mathematical formula
Week 5: Branching Statements (Take-home Assignment)
Week 6: Loop 
Week 7: Array / Vector / Matrix
Week 8: Midterm simulation
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Programming on mathematical formula (I)
Week 11: Programming on mathematical formula (II)
Week 12: Programming on Branching and Loop (I)
Week 13: Programming on Branching and Loop (II)
Week 14: Programming on Branching and Loop (III)
Week 15: Programming on Functions and Subroutines (I)
Week 16: Overall Review
Week 17: Final exam. simulation
Week 18: Final exam.
scorePolicy:
Assignments and Activities: 25% +/- 5%
Midterm: 25% +/- 5%
Final exam: 50% +/- 10%
